scripts.deploy-to-demo: haw build && publisssh build zooniverse-demo/plankton-z8e && rm -rf ./build && zapper
scripts.deploy-to-beta: haw build && publisssh build www.planktonportal.org/beta && rm -rf ./build
scripts.deploy-to-production: haw build && publisssh build www.planktonportal.org && rm -rf ./build
